# ziti_certificate_authority (Data Source)

Ziti Certificate Authority Data Source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ziti_certificate_authority" "test_certificate_authority_data" {
  name = "test_certificate_authority"
}

output "ziti_ca" {
  value = data.ziti_certificate_authority.test_certificate_authority_data
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `external_id_claim` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--external_id_claim))
- `id` (String) Identifier
- `name` (String) Name of the Certificate Authority

### Read-Only

- `cert_pem` (String) Certificate PEM
- `identity_name_format` (String) Identity Name Format
- `identityroles` (List of String) Identity Roles
- `is_auth_enabled` (Boolean) Auth Flag
- `is_autoca_enrollment_enabled` (Boolean) Auto CA Enrollment Flag
- `is_ottca_enrollment_enabled` (Boolean) OTT CA Enrollment Flag
- `tags` (Map of String) Certificate Authority Tags

<a id="nestedatt--external_id_claim"></a>
### Nested Schema for `external_id_claim`

Read-Only:

- `index` (Number) Index
- `location` (String) Location
- `matcher` (String) Matcher
- `matchercriteria` (String) Matcher Criteria
- `parser` (String) Parser
- `parsercriteria` (String) Parser Criteria
